title: Waiting For Mr. Right
description: Dolores is smart. Dolores is sexy. And at the age of thirty-two, Dolores is still a virgin. Just when she is about to commit body and soul to her fiance' Brad, she catches him cheating. After years of Waiting For Mr. Right, she says the hell with love and calls on her promiscuous best friend Liz to help her get laid. But in her journey to discover carnal knowledge, Dolores finds out what life, love, and sex are all about.
author: Christopher J. Moore
